resources.string: Enjoy The Best Movies and TV shows Out There
Watch full seasons of exclusive streaming series and episodes, including the latest hit movies, Hulu Originals, kids shows, and many more

Hulu is your personal cinema companion, designed to help you discover, track, and organize your favorite films. Our app provides a seamless experience for browsing trending movies, keeping track of what you\'re watching, and saving your favorites for easy access.\n\nBuilt with modern Android development practices, MovieHub offers a clean and intuitive interface that puts the focus on what matters most - the movies you love.

• Movie Discovery: Browse trending and latest movies with detailed information

• Favorites System: Save your favorite movies for quick access with one tap

• Detailed Information: View ratings, genres, runtimes, and other essential details

• Image Galleries: Explore multiple images for each movie

• Beautiful UI: Enjoy a clean, modern interface with intuitive navigation

• Badge Notifications: Keep track of your favorites count with our dynamic badge system

Developed using:
• Kotlin
• Android Architecture Components
• Room Database for local storage
• Coil3 for image loading
• Material Design components
• Gson for JSON parsing
• Coroutines for asynchronous operations

Movie data sourced from public API collections.
